Overview:
Teledyne Space Imaging is dedicated to delivering the best imaging solutions for our customers in Space, Defence and Science.

We are part of a group of leading-edge companies aligned under the Teledyne umbrella. With unrivalled expertise across the spectrum and decades of experience, the collective of Teledyne Space Imaging offers world-leading technology and exceptional capabilities in sensing and synthesis, helping you capture better data and analyze it for better decisions.

Individually, our sister companies each offer best-in-class products and technology. Together, we combine and leverage each other's strengths to provide the deepest, widest imaging technology portfolio on this (or other) worlds. From aerospace through industrial inspection, radiography and radiotherapy, geospatial surveying, and advanced MEMS and semiconductor solutions, Teledyne Space Imaging offers you world-wide customer support and the technical expertise to handle your toughest tasks. Our tools, technologies, and imaging solutions are built to bring you competitive advantage.
